dataList.dlg: I’ve followed the flow to this place, and I’ll cut down all that impedes it.
I normally rise early in the morning. Watching the sun on the horizon gives me the feeling that the day has begun.
Rodion… She kept on insisting that she take me to a restaurant. Though the concept is foreign to me, it would seem that some people derive joy from eating.
When you wish to clear your mind, admiring the moonlight can help.
You shouldn’t restrain yourself from cutting down whatever obstructs your way, even if it is to wound your heart as well.
I dislike long conversation. No words hold more weight than those of clashing blades.
Bearing a sword naturally makes your mind calm and your actions swift.
To become a leader is to sail a vast sea. It is a wide-spanning ordeal, with no destination in clear sight… yet there is nowhere to fall back to.
To what extents are you willing to go for the sake of your goal, Executive Manager? Alongside that… how much of yourself can you withstand to forfeit?
These days, advanced technology makes erasing bloodstains a trivial task, as though it were only right that we forget about death that easily.
If you so wish… I shall serve you.
I will dispatch them.
It’s time to have blades meet.
I’d appreciate it if you could keep it simple.
I won’t stand back.
I should be able to slay them with ease.
Mmpf!
A result earned through calmness.
That must be tough to recover, Executive Manager.
I see you know your way around a sword.
It was my fault for neglecting to train.
I only followed the path I saw.
I slew them all, dancing along with the flow.
I hold no regrets.
